name: Delta
description: Describes the information that controls delta check warnings.

fields.name: Normal Range
fields.description: Specifies the normal interval of the reference data

fields.name: Numeric Threshold
fields.description: The numeric threshold of the change that is detected.

fields.name: Change Computation
fields.description: Specifies if the change is computed as a percent change or as an absolute change. Refer to HL7 Table 0523 - Computation type for valid values.

fields.name: Days Retained
fields.description: The length of time in days that the value is retained for computing delta checks.
